node.excerpt: I did a cover song for the A Spray of Plum Blossoms (一剪梅). The song is also as known, or better known, as Xue Hua Piao Piao Bei Feng Xiao Xiao. It has become one of the latest Internet memes.  Motivation This oldie Chinese song has become really…

frontmatter.title: Xue Hua Piao Piao
frontmatter.spoiler: I made a cover song with the virtual singer and my four-year-old daughter.
